channel.title: Help me with some easy 508 stuff plx :)
channel.description:
:) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) hope u can help me:) here are the questipons --------------->
1. how can i make commands? can anyone post a GIVE ITEM command, and teleport command and something else that i can copy off? and where can i paste the commands?
2. how to make shops? and what folder to make and put out shops?
3. how to put out npc's? and what folder to put out npc's?
4. how to make teleports and like that? i mean how to change the teleports in the mage book at normal, ancients and lunar? and which folder?
5. how to add custom items? and where to put it?
6. (LAST ONE) how to make other ppl's staff?
please answer as quikly u can i need that help now ;D :D ;D :D ;D :D ;D :o :rolleyes: :) ;) :D ;D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 05, 2009, 11:16:52 am[/size][hr]and something more the client or source has 3000 - 3k max how to change that lvl 3-40 have to use 3k as max but 41-136 or something like that can trade 2147m? and where?
and how to change the exp rate? or where?

item.title: Help me with some easy 508 stuff plx :)
item.dc:creator: @Frozen_pvpers Frozen pvpers
item.description:
@Frozen_pvpers wrote:

[quote=“kneistol, post:14, topic:312596”][quote author=Frozen pvpers link=topic=409031.msg3019113#msg3019113 date=1257461943]

if you knew how to make someone staff on a 317 its not hard to do on a 508 -.-

your sir, are a fucking noob and don’t know shit about 508’s so stfu
it’s different for changing staff on 508s nub

you fag, are a retarted chimp, keep talking bitch.

you guys, should both chill out, seriously xD

I’ll just show you where to go, I won’t give you pre-made coding stuff (sorry.).

to change the rights you could either

  1. go into the character files and edit rights:0 to rights:1+ or so
  2. go into login.java or RS2loginprotocol.java, and add something that will make them mod\admin\owner when they login
  3. make a ::giveadmin\givemod command or so, to make them staff.

to change the teleports
Search for PlayerMagic (might need to go into player.java aswell, depending on the source).

to code commands
Search for commands.java, there you should be able to code a new command (learn a bit of coding before you fuck up the whole commandslist ;)).

to remove\spawn NPC’s
Search for npclist.cfg and npcspawn.cfg (should be around the character files etc).

to add shops
you should need to make your whole new file, coding the whole thing yourself \finding a copy-paste ‘tutorial’ on how to make shops.

to add custom items
step 1)You need to go into your client, add the model in your client, change the class8.java.
step 2)On your server, you need to find the items.cfg , import the name etc, change stats if you want.
step 3)Edit the equipment.java in packethandler\packets
step 4)Test it.
(let me know if I’m missing something on this one!)

good luck man, and I suggest you read some tutorials, there are TONS of them around:p
[/quote]

thx so much frozen pvpers :)[/quote]

you’re welcome
only thing left to do is actually code the things now

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with some easy 508 stuff plx :)

item.title: Help me with some easy 508 stuff plx :)
item.dc:creator: @Frozen_pvpers Frozen pvpers
item.description:
@Frozen_pvpers wrote:

[quote=“daewoo45, post:10, topic:312596”][quote author=jamessemple link=topic=409031.msg3019002#msg3019002 date=1257455234]

if you knew how to make someone staff on a 317 its not hard to do on a 508 -.-

your sir, are a fucking noob and don’t know shit about 508’s so stfu
it’s different for changing staff on 508s nub
[/quote]

you fag, are a retarted chimp, keep talking bitch.[/quote]

you guys, should both chill out, seriously xD

I’ll just show you where to go, I won’t give you pre-made coding stuff (sorry.).

to change the rights you could either

  1. go into the character files and edit rights:0 to rights:1+ or so
  2. go into login.java or RS2loginprotocol.java, and add something that will make them mod\admin\owner when they login
  3. make a ::giveadmin\givemod command or so, to make them staff.

to change the teleports
Search for PlayerMagic (might need to go into player.java aswell, depending on the source).

to code commands
Search for commands.java, there you should be able to code a new command (learn a bit of coding before you fuck up the whole commandslist ;)).

to remove\spawn NPC’s
Search for npclist.cfg and npcspawn.cfg (should be around the character files etc).

to add shops
you should need to make your whole new file, coding the whole thing yourself \finding a copy-paste ‘tutorial’ on how to make shops.

to add custom items
step 1)You need to go into your client, add the model in your client, change the class8.java.
step 2)On your server, you need to find the items.cfg , import the name etc, change stats if you want.
step 3)Edit the equipment.java in packethandler\packets
step 4)Test it.
(let me know if I’m missing something on this one!)

good luck man, and I suggest you read some tutorials, there are TONS of them around:p
